entry.title: Digital web transformation for a forward thinking oil company
entry.content:
The product team needs an app to go to market. Marketing has to design this year’s flagship campaign and a five-year communications vision. IT wants to replace frustrating, outdated internal software. Different business problems, different needs. We can help.

The product team needs an app to go to market. Marketing has to design this year’s flagship campaign and a five-year communications vision. IT wants to replace frustrating, outdated internal software. Different business problems, different needs. We can help.

Challenges

Anime Expo is the largest anime and manga convention in North America. Hundreds of thousands of fans flock to the event hosted at the Los Angeles Convention Center. Apart from the convention itself, the Anime Expo website serves as the main touchpoint and information thoroughfare for fans year round.

Solution

Anime Expo is the largest anime and manga convention in North America. Hundreds of thousands of fans flock to the event hosted at the Los Angeles Convention Center. Apart from the convention itself, the Anime Expo website serves as the main touchpoint and information thoroughfare for fans year round.

Result

Anime Expo is the largest anime and manga convention in North America. Hundreds of thousands of fans flock to the event hosted at the Los Angeles Convention Center. Apart from the convention itself, the Anime Expo website serves as the main touchpoint and information thoroughfare for fans year round.
